articles.author: Brock Blasdell, The Arizona Republic
articles.title: Disruptive passenger forces American Airlines Flight 694 to return to Sky Harbor Airport - The Arizona Republic
articles.description: The flight was mid-air to Honolulu when it began its unscheduled return to Sky Harbor. Officials did not share details on the passenger or disruption.
articles.content:
An American Airlines flight from Phoenix to Honolulu had to be rerouted due to a disruptive passenger Sunday evening, according to American Airlines officials. 
Flight 694 was already mid-air before… [+866 chars]
